sense.def:
Kdor je
blind
, ne vidi, ker ima poškodovane oči.

seg.quote: The accident had left him almost totally blind.
Eye damage can result in temporary or permanent blindness.

sense.def:
Ljudi, ki so slepi, imenujemo
the blind
.

Kadar nekaj
blinds someone
, tisti človek krajši čas ali nikoli več ne more videti.

seg.quote: My eyes were momentarily blinded by flash bulbs.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
blind to a fact or situation
, nekega dejstva ali okoliščin ne opazi ali se jih ne zaveda.

seg.quote: He was blind to everything except his immediate needs.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
blinds someone to the real situation
, mu prepreči, da bi videl ali se zavedel resničnosti določenih okoliščin.

seg.quote: We have to beware that missionary zeal doesn't blind us to the realities here.

sense.def:
Prepričanja ali dejanja nekega človeka so
blind
, kadar se tisti človek ne ozira na dejstva ali se vede nerazumno.

seg.quote: ...her blind faith in the wisdom of her Church.
She had driven him into a blind rage.

sense.def:
Ovinek, ki je
blind
, je tisti, okoli katerega ne vidimo.

A blind
je zvitek blaga ali papirja, ki ga potegnemo čez okno, da zastremo pot svetlobi.
